update inbox

sendUserId = #{senduserid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

affairState = #{affairstate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
InTime = #{intime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
